chart_description: This chart displays the status of the system clock on the monitored server. It shows whether the clock is in sync or out of sync and whether there are any errors related to clock synchronization.

dimension_descriptions.clockerr: This dimension shows whether there have been clock synchronization errors. A value of 0 indicates no errors while a value of 1 indicates one or more errors.
dimension_descriptions.unsync: This dimension shows whether the system clock is in sync with the reference clock. A value of 0 indicates the clocks are in sync while a value of 1 indicates they are not in sync.
